gic_noise_scale.description: noise scale factor for GIC correction
gic_noise_scale.additional_notes: GIC correction will be stronger as gic_noise_scale increases.

gic_correction_strength.additional_notes: GIC correction will be stronger as gic_correction_strength increases. 256 means full strength.

thin_line_noise_offset.description: noise offset for edge-thin line detection in GIC
thin_line_noise_offset.additional_notes: GIC correction will be stronger and less edge/thin line will be detected as thin_line_noise_offset

pnr_noise_scale_tab.description: noise scale factor for PNR correction
pnr_noise_scale_tab.additional_notes: PNR correction will be stronger as pnr_noise_scale increases.

pnr_correction_strength.additional_notes: PNR correction will be stronger as pnr_correction_strength increases. 256 means full strength.

radial_pnr_str_adj_tab.description: radial adjustment for peak noise reduction (PNR) strength
radial_pnr_str_adj_tab.additional_notes: PNR will be stronger as radial_pnr_str_adj increases. In general, radial_pnr_str_adj is a monotonically increasing curve.
